ComicInfo.Summary:
Secrets are revealed as Jasmine, Ali, and the remnants of the Forty Thieves must travel to the ruins of Machu Picchu and confront the secret powerful pursuer of the last piece of the Crown of Kings.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Allan Otero & Jorge Cortes | 2 | C | Cover C | Meguro | 3 | D | Cover D | Sheldon Goh & Sanju Nivangune | 4 | E | Wizard World Chicago Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Keith Garvey | Missing | F | Secret Exclusive Variant Cover | Derlis Santacruz (a) & Sanju Nivangune (c) | Missing |
